is-binary-path

Check if a filepath is a binary file

Install

$ npm install --save is-binary-path

Usage

```js var isBinaryPath = require(‘is-binary-path’);

isBinaryPath(‘src/unicorn.png’); //=> true

isBinaryPath(‘src/unicorn.txt’); //=> false ```

Related

  • binary-extensions - List of binary file extensions
  • is-text-path - Check if a filepath is a text file
